tool_description: This api uses U.GG to provide you information for any summoner in league of legends
name: LoL_Stats
title: LoL_Stats

api_list.name: Get an overview for a summoner
api_list.description:
It returns an overview of the summoner from U.GG

For the region you have to choose between:
"na1" , "euw1", "eun1" , "kr",  "br1" ,"jp1", "ru" , "oc1" , "tr1", "la1" , "la2"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lol_stats.p.rapidapi.com/euw1/SuperTony"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lol_stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lol_stats.p.rapidapi.com/{region}/{summonersname}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lol_stats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
